channel.title: Cache Editing
channel.description:
I've recently realized, if a certain team of people were to get Cache Editing to work, they could keep advancing it and release a program to edit caches. I got the idea from Kevin (Rune-Server.org). He's made object editors, Floor Editors, and Item editors. If we got this one thing to work we wouldn't be so pressing about getting a 459 client and server, because we could just add the objects and items we want.
Anyway, I know I'll get "Good luck, only 2 other people have dun it nub" from alot of people, but I know it's very possbile.
Now, to be part of this Cache Editing team you'll need: Client Knowledge A little bit of Cache knowledge (If your asking wtf is a cache, you don't qualify) MSN Live An MSN Account Desire to work and make something awesome
I'm only accepting 5 people, because honestly if more than five know how, someone will leak it out before it's ready.
Current Members of the team: Yours Truly ;) Mac EwfsPrince Mage Owner
[u]Completed so far[/u] [s]Unpacking the Cache[/s] [s]Viewing Models[/s] Converting files - Basically done Editing files - Pretty Much done Converting back - Basically done [s]Repacking[/s]
PS- Repacking will be much harder than anything else.

item.title: Cache Editing
item.dc:creator: @O_M_G1 O M G
item.description:
@O_M_G1 wrote:

I’ve recently realized, if a certain team of people were to get Cache Editing to work, they could keep advancing it and release a program to edit caches. I got the idea from Kevin (Rune-Server.org). He’s made object editors, Floor Editors, and Item editors. If we got this one thing to work we wouldn’t be so pressing about getting a 459 client and server, because we could just add the objects and items we want.

Anyway, I know I’ll get “Good luck, only 2 other people have dun it nub” from alot of people, but I know it’s very possbile.

Now, to be part of this Cache Editing team you’ll need:
Client Knowledge
A little bit of Cache knowledge (If your asking wtf is a cache, you don’t qualify)
MSN Live
An MSN Account
Desire to work and make something awesome

I’m only accepting 5 people, because honestly if more than five know how, someone will leak it out before it’s ready.

Current Members of the team:
Yours Truly
Mac
EwfsPrince
Mage Owner

Completed so far
Unpacking the Cache
Viewing Models
Converting files - Basically done
Editing files - Pretty Much done
Converting back - Basically done
Repacking

PS- Repacking will be much harder than anything else.

Read full topic
